colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI, MDZES LDAN BRAG RI'I DBEN GNAS SGRUB SDE YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN 'PHEL RGYAS GLING DU DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I CHO GA 'DZUGS 'DUN GYI SKABS, DON GNYER CAN GYI SLOB BU 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR, MKHAN PO CHOS RJER 'BOD PA ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES BSGRIGS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I BSHAD SGRUB KYI BSTAN PA DRI MA MED PA PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
